name: date(era:year:month:day:hour:minute:second:nanosecond:)
desc: Returns a date created with the given components.
declaration:

     year yearValue: Int, 
    month monthValue: Int,

   minute minuteValue: Int,

nanosecond nanosecondValue: Int) -> Date?
